Key Match Events: Luka Doncic had 27 points and 13 assists, leading the Dallas Mavericks to a 119-99 victory over the Chicago Bulls.
Kyrie Irving and Daniel Gafford each scored 17 points for the Mavericks.
Nikola Vucevic had 14 points and 10 rebounds for the Bulls.
Rookie Matas Buzelis scored 13 points and grabbed nine rebounds for the Bulls.
Doncic, Klay Thompson, and Irving hit consecutive 3-pointers during a 17-0 run in the first period, giving Dallas a 22-9 lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas Mavericks outscored the Chicago Bulls 60-48 in the paint.
Dallas led in points off turnovers 28-13.
